pages.text: The anoxic heating of $(item)Coal$() in a special type of furnace known as a $(item)$(l:multiblocks/coke_oven)Coke Oven$() can be used to produce $(item)Coke$(), a fuel twice as efficient as $(item)Coal$(). $(item)Coal Blocks$() can also be directly processed into $(item)Coke Blocks$().
